welcome.title: What is goin on with this

content.1: THIS IS A COLLECTION OF DIFFERENT APIS, SOMETIMES FUNNY, SOMETIMES A LITTLE MORE USEFUL
content.3: AND SEE WHAT'S WAITING FOR YOU :D!

memes.author: Autor
memes.content: This section is responsible for downloading random memes from different categories. The source of the funny pictures are the respective reddit groups. To upload a new image, press one of the highlighted categories. Remember that memes are completely random, so they don't all have to be funny, and some may be controversial.
